# my_mltools

[![codecov](https://codecov.io/gh/YangWu1227/my_mltools/branch/main/graph/badge.svg?token=9ZL267TMVD)](https://codecov.io/gh/YangWu1227/my_mltools)

My machine learning toolkit.

## Installation

```bash
$ pip install my_mltools
```
